name: phish-master
description: A user-friendly phishing tool for educational purposes, enabling custom campaign creation and deployment via a web GUI.

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-requirements && cd app && cd static && npm install
scripts.env: clear && echo "RUN: 'source ./venv/bin/activate' To Enter In python Virtual Enviroment." && exit 1
scripts.purge-css: sass app/static/scss/style.scss app/static/css/style.css && postcss app/static/css/style.css -o app/static/css/style.css

author: Armoghan-ul-Mohmin
